messages.title: SCOTLAND NEEDS A STRONG & EFFECTIVE OPPOSITION TO HOLD THE SNP TO ACCOUNT.
messages.content: On Thursday 5th May there will be an election to the Scottish Parliament. I have a clear message for you ahead of that election. A vote for me and my team is a vote to say NO to a second independence referendum, and a clear message to the SNP to focus on running the country.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Opposition to a Second Independence Referendum
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A clear message to the SNP to focus on running the country instead of a second independence referendum.

mentions.tacticalSituation: With your support, we can make this happen. We can get the SNP Government to focus on running the country, not another referendum.

issues.governance: A clear message to the SNP to focus on running the country.

leaflet.personalStatement: So this is my pledge to you: vote for me and I promise to lead a credible and competent opposition that can be counted on to hold the SNP to account and to stand firm against a second independence referendum.

politicalExperience.role: Leader of the Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. Remember to cast your regional vote to ensure the SNP is held to account and secure Scotland's place in the UK.
